Injector/Bumblebee/Scavenger/Manterror:



Injector slowly got up, hand on his forehead, groaning.

"What...the...slag..." he said, looking down to the lower part of his body, 
which had a large gap in it, dry mech-fluid stainin it.  Not to mention it 
was charred badly.  Kicking Bumblebee, the other Predacon flyer slowly 
shaking his head.

Bumblebee let out a groan, slowly opening his optic sensors.  Looking around, 
he saw some feet, and looked up, seeing Injector.

"Ugh...how'd we get down here?"

"Someone shot us, you idiot."

"O...oh.  Wh...what now?"

"We...get out of here, obviously."

"Good enough, for me," the other flying Predacon said, pushing himself to his 
feet, "I hate it here." he finished, lifting off into the air, followed by 
Injector.


---

Manterror gathered himself up, looking around.  He could make out Bumblebee 
and Injector flying int he air, heading for Hell Beast's ship (or at least, 
it used to be his), that one Oblitercon (Scavenger) entering the Alliance 
base, and Prowl and Iron Raptor nearly faded out of his sight.  

"Well, if you can't beat 'em, join them." he shrugged, the green robot 
transforming to beast mode (a abnormally large praying mantis) and headed off 
for the Predacon base, and the CR chambers it held in its depths.

---

Scavenger put ont he brakes, transforming to robot mode, flipping through the 
air perfectly, landing on his feet.  He entered the craft, heading for the CR 
chambers.
